Text: Whew... That's the last one.
Good job, Epsilon.

It must have been quite challenging to cure six
infants in a row, wasn't it?
Not...really...
You say that, but you're out of breath...
Still, I'm really glad we could save them.
Yes... Thank goodness!
So, how did things go on your end?

Gamma will soon arrange for a carriage to come and
pick us up.
I'll watch the perimeter, so you can rest, Epsilon.
Thank you... I'm honestly exhausted today...!
No. 111... I wonder if she's alright.
She seemed to be quite shocked.
Maybe I should say something to her—

I think it's important someone talks to her now, but
I don't think that's our role as the Seven Shadows.
I guess you're right.

It's the words from someone on the ground with her
that can reach her...

You were the embodiment of rage. That spear of
yours was like a shooting star.

While possessed, you don't feel hunger as long as
your magic isn't depleted. Still...

I don't know why they stored the possessed infants
in those boxes that preserve magic energy...

But that's something future investigations will
reveal.

And if we keep fighting, we may continue to witness
more of the Cult's cruel schemes, just as we did
tonight.
...I'll fight.
I'll fight with the Shadow Garden... I'll see it through.

I want to safeguard lives that deserve protection,
like those infants. I want to secure the future of
many from the clutches of the Cult.
That's what I can do to seek atonement.
*sigh* Jeez...

Why do you let your emotions lead to such impulsive
and momentous decisions?
Like you said, it must be in my nature.
Nature, huh...

...Then, I wonder if these feelings I have towards
you are also part of my nature.

You're impulsive yet vulnerable and far too
reckless... I can't just leave you to your own
devices.
So, I'll have to be the one to protect you.

It's a first for me to feel this strongly for
someone else. But...I find this new side of
me quite intriguing.

In other words, you've become a very interesting...
and important person to me.

Heh... Will that be your reason for fighting with
the Garden?

It seems so. This is what it must mean to be
genuinely affected by someone else's plight
as if it were your own.

...I'll tell you this much. I'm not just someone who
needs protection.

I know that. I wouldn't mind being protected by you
occasionally.

So, that's how it's going to be. Glad you have my
back, partner.
Yeah... Likewise, partner.

...And so we saved the possessed infants from the
clutches of the Cult of Diablos!
R-Right...!
(...I know what this is. It's youthful exuberance!)

(That's right. This is that kind of solo play where
one dreams up dark or morbid settings and laughs it
off in a nihilistic way. Just like playing solitaire!)

(Beta's always been fond of stories, so I'd expect
as much from her...but I'm surprised to see Epsilon
showing symptoms as well!)

(She may be an elf from another world, but she's no
exception. It looks like any sufficiently intelligent
life form is susceptible to this kind of "awakening"!)

How could they commit such atrocities...! They must
not be allowed to get away with this, Master Shadow!
(Yes, I must absolutely allow it.)

(Any attempt to deny this road everyone treads will
lead down the path of delinquency!)
Until...they become adults...!

Yes! Everyone in the Shadow Garden will help raise
the rescued infants in Alexandria!

(Well, being the impressionable young girl that she
is, I'm sure Epsilon will grow out of it eventually.)

(But that's fine. Her choice, like everyone else's,
should be respected.)
Because it's the path I also once walked...

Oh...true! It's like how you raised us, the Seven
Shadows!
Uh-huh... Everyone eventually grows up!
Yes, my lord! I will do my best!
